"CABLE",2006,12
Scores will be settled and lives hang in the balance. The X-Men versus Ultimate Cable in the brawl of the century-any century! Plus-more secrets revealed about this strange mystery man from the future. Don't believe you really know what he's all about. You don't. Part 3 (of 4)
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Jason Keith | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller (cover):Ben Oliver
